editsimilar-thanks: This is a label saying thank you for your contribution. $2 is plural for message for example this related page and these related pages. * $1 is a username.
editsimilar-thanks-notsimilar: This is a label saying thank you for your contribution. $2 is plural for message for example This page and These pages. * $1 is a username.
editsimilar-thankyou: This is a label saying thank you for your contribution. * $1 is a username.
editsimilar-link-disable: This is a button saying preferences
tog-edit-similar: This is a label saying to enable similar pages suggestions
